Text:
The FACTS about ENTITLEMENTS"

ENTITLEMENTS are just that - the American people are ENTITLED to them - Like voting.

A majority of the US House of Representatives and a majority of the US Senate and a President of the United states all decided with the support of the nation they represent that we should be ENTITLED to these benefits as the mark of a civilized society.

Romney doesn't have a snowball's chance in hell of being elected.  That being said, Obama isn't much better what with ICE shutting down file sharing sites in return for billions from hollywood.

I will be abstaining in November.
